level.text: No person, agent, or employee of any person shall, in the course of doing business, distribute any free cigarettes or other tobacco products to any person on any public street, public sidewalk, public park, playground, in a public building, other public property, or private property open to the public.
A person may distribute free cigarettes or other tobacco products only under the following circumstances:
At a tobacco store to persons eighteen (18) years of age or older,
At a convention to persons eighteen (18) years of age or older, or
At a conference catering to persons eighteen (18) years of age or older.
